'''Linden Wood''' is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Linden Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Linden Wood can be found in the South-East of [[Fontaine]] on the islands in the South-Eastern half of the [[Morte Region]] through [[Lumidouce Harbor]] up to the most Eastern islands of [[Erinnyes Forest]] and in the [[Belleau Region]] around [[Denouement of Sin]].
